mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.DOC_NO, C.DOC_FORM, A.DOC_TITLE, D.EMP_NAME, A.DFT_DATE, B.SCRTY_REQ_DATE FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO JOIN DOCUMENT_TYPE C ON A.DOC_TYPE = C.DOC_TYPE_NO JOIN USER_INFO D ON A.DRAFTER = D.EMP_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY 6 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO JOIN DOCUMENT_TYPE C ON A.DOC_TYPE = C.DOC_TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN LEAVE_APP D ON A.DOC_NO = D.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN CMT_UPDATE_APP E ON A.DOC_NO = E.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_DFT F ON A.DOC_NO = F.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_COOP G ON A.DOC_NO = G.DOC_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'Y'
AND C.DOC_FORM = #{docForm}
AND A.DOC_NO LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%'
AND A.DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%'
AND (D.VAC_REASON LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%' OR E.UPDATE_REASON LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%' OR F.DFT_CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%' OR G.COOP_CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%')
AND B.SCRTY_REASON LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%'

SELECT A.DOC_NO, C.DOC_FORM, A.DOC_TITLE, D.EMP_NAME, A.DFT_DATE, B.SCRTY_SET_DATE FROM APRV_DOCUMENT A JOIN SECURITY_DOC B ON A.DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO JOIN DOCUMENT_TYPE C ON A.DOC_TYPE = C.DOC_TYPE_NO JOIN USER_INFO D ON A.DRAFTER = D.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN LEAVE_APP E ON A.DOC_NO = E.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN CMT_UPDATE_APP F ON A.DOC_NO = F.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_DFT G ON A.DOC_NO = G.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN BUSINESS_COOP H ON A.DOC_NO = H.DOC_NO WHERE B.SCRTY_STATUS = 'Y'
AND C.DOC_FORM = #{docForm}
AND A.DOC_NO LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%'
AND A.DOC_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%'
AND (E.VAC_REASON LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%' OR F.UPDATE_REASON LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%' OR G.DFT_CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%' OR H.COOP_CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%')
AND B.SCRTY_REASON LIKE '%' ||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY 6 DESC
